trans-unit.source: Represents a cell that contains a link.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en celle som inneholder en kobling.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewLinkCell class is a specialized type of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> used to display links.
trans-unit.target: Klassen DataGridViewLinkCell er en spesiell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>brukes til å vise koblinger.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn> is the column type specialized to hold cells of this type.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn>kolonnetypen som er spesielle for lagring av cellene av denne typen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is initialized to a new DataGridViewLinkCell.
trans-unit.target: Som standard i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>initialiseres til en ny DataGridViewLinkCell.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To pattern the cells within a column after an existing DataGridViewLinkCell, set the column's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property to the cell to use as a pattern.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil mønsteret cellene i en kolonne etter en eksisterende DataGridViewLinkCell, setter du kolonnen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A>egenskapen celle som skal brukes som et mønster.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The cell-related properties of the column are wrappers for the similarly-named properties of the template cell.
trans-unit.target: Egenskaper relatert til cellen for kolonnen er sikkerhetsgrupper for navnet på samme måte-egenskapene for malen celle.

trans-unit.source: Changing the property values of the template cell will affect only cells based on the template that are added after the change.
trans-unit.target: Endring av egenskapsverdiene for malen cellen påvirker bare celler basert på mal som er lagt til etter at endringen.

trans-unit.source: Changing the cell-related property values of the column, however, will update the template cell and all other cells in the column, and refresh the column display if necessary.
trans-unit.target: Endring av cellen-relaterte egenskapsverdiene i kolonnen, imidlertid oppdaterer malen cellen og alle celler i kolonnen, og oppdatere kolonnevisningen om nødvendig.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color used to display an active link.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir fargen som brukes til å vise en aktiv kobling.

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.ActiveLinkColor%2A> property of the owning column also sets the ActiveLinkColor property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Angivelse av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.ActiveLinkColor%2A>-egenskapen til kolonnen eier også angir egenskapen ActiveLinkColor for hver celle i kolonnen og oppdaterer kolonnen skjermbildet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.ActiveLinkColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil overstyre den angitte verdien for individuelle celler, kan du angi celleverdiene når du har angitt verdien i kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the color used to display a link that is being selected.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> som representerer fargene som brukes til å vise en kobling som blir merket.

trans-unit.source: The default value is the user's Internet Explorer setting for the color of links in the hover state.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er brukeren for Internet Explorer innstillingen for fargen på koblinger i tilstanden Hold pekeren.

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this cell.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en nøyaktig kopi av denne cellen.

trans-unit.source: Override the Clone method whenever you derive from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell> and add new properties to the derived class.
trans-unit.target: Overstyr klone-metoden når du avledes fra <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell>og legge til nye egenskaper utledede klassen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the cloned <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som representerer det klonede <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessible object for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter et nytt objekt som er tilgjengelig for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the CreateAccessibilityInstance method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.DataGridViewLinkCellAccessibleObject> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke eksplisitt kalle metoden CreateAccessibilityInstance, den kan kalles når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.DataGridViewLinkCellAccessibleObject>egenskapen det refereres til.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.DataGridViewLinkCellAccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get or set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Ikke hente eller angi <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>, må du legge til en referanse til det `Accessibility` samling installert med .NET Framework.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.DataGridViewLinkCellAccessibleObject> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.DataGridViewLinkCellAccessibleObject> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell"></xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.DataGridViewLinkCellAccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the cell's hosted editing control.
trans-unit.target: Henter kontrolltypen den cellen vertsbaserte redigering.

trans-unit.source: As implemented in this class, this property always returns `null` because a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell> cannot be edited.
trans-unit.target: Som implementert i denne klassen, denne egenskapen returnerer alltid `null` fordi en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell>kan ikke redigeres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell>

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the display <xref:System.Type> of the cell value.
trans-unit.target: Henter visningen <xref:System.Type>av celleverdien.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The display <xref:System.Type> of the cell value.
trans-unit.target: Visningen <xref:System.Type>av celleverdien.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounding rectangle that encloses the cell's content area, which is calculated using the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> and cell style.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer det avgrensende rektangelet som omslutter den cellen området innhold, som beregnes ved hjelp av den angitte <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> og stil for celler.

trans-unit.source: The graphics context for the cell.
trans-unit.target: Grafikk konteksten for cellen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to be applied to the cell.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> som skal brukes til cellen.

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for den cellen overordnet rad.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that bounds the cell's contents.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som bounds celleinnholdet.

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounding rectangle that encloses the cell's error icon, if one is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer det avgrensende rektangelet som omslutter den cellen Feilikonet Hvis én vises.

trans-unit.source: The graphics context for the cell.
trans-unit.target: Grafikk konteksten for cellen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to be applied to the cell.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> som skal brukes til cellen.

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for den cellen overordnet rad.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that bounds the cell's error icon, if one is displayed; otherwise, <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som bounds den cellen ikon, hvis det vises; ellers, <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Calculates the preferred size, in pixels, of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Beregner den foretrukne størrelsen på cellen i piksler.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the cell.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> brukes til å tegne cellen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the cell.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> som representerer stilen på cellen.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based row index of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte radindeksen av cellen.

trans-unit.source: The cell's maximum allowable size.
trans-unit.target: Den cellen maksimal tillatt størrelse.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the preferred size, in pixels, of the cell.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> som representerer den foretrukne størrelsen på cellen i piksler.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Henter verdien i cellen.

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for den cellen overordnet rad.

trans-unit.source: The value contained in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the row containing the cell will be unshared when a key is released and the cell has focus.
trans-unit.target: Angir om raden som inneholder cellen blir delt når en nøkkel er utgitt og cellen er i fokus.

trans-unit.source: KeyUpUnsharesRow is called just before <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.OnKeyUp%2A>.
trans-unit.target: KeyUpUnsharesRow kalles like før <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.OnKeyUp%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.OnKeyUp%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.OnKeyUp%2A> has the effect of unsharing the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: Det må returnere `true` hvis kallet til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.OnKeyUp%2A>har effekten avslutting av deling av raden som inneholder cellen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.OnKeyUp%2A>

trans-unit.source: It should return `false` otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Det må returnere `false` ellers.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om deling av rad [anbefalte fremgangsmåter for skalering i Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about the key press.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder data om nøkkelen press.

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen i raden som inneholder cellen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the SPACE key was released, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.TrackVisitedState*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.LinkVisited*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, and the CTRL, ALT, and SHIFT keys are not pressed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis nøkkelen for DISKPLASS er frigjort, den <> </> *> egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, <> </> *> egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, og CTRL, ALT og SKIFT er ikke trykket; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that represents the behavior of a link.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir virkemåten til en kobling.

trans-unit.source: Examples of link behavior include whether the link always displays an underline or the link only displays an underline when the mouse pointer moves over it, and whether a double click or a single click activates a link.
trans-unit.target: Om koblingen viser alltid understreking eller koblingen viser bare understreking når musepekeren flyttes over den, og om et Dobbeltklikk eller ett enkelt klikk aktiverer en kobling er eksempler på koblingen virkemåte.

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.LinkBehavior%2A> property of the owning column also sets the LinkBehavior property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Angivelse av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.LinkBehavior%2A>-egenskapen til kolonnen eier også angir egenskapen LinkBehavior for hver celle i kolonnen og oppdaterer kolonnen skjermbildet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.LinkBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil overstyre den angitte verdien for individuelle celler, kan du angi celleverdiene når du har angitt verdien i kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkBehavior"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkBehavior"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkBehavior"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkBehavior"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkBehavior"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien når du setter denne egenskapen ikke er et gyldig <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkBehavior"> </xref> verdi.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color used to display an inactive and unvisited link.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir fargen som brukes til å vise en inaktiv og ikke besøkte koblingen.

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.LinkColor%2A> property of the owning column also sets the LinkColor property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Angivelse av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.LinkColor%2A>-egenskapen til kolonnen eier også angir egenskapen LinkColor for hver celle i kolonnen og oppdaterer kolonnen skjermbildet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.LinkColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil overstyre den angitte verdien for individuelle celler, kan du angi celleverdiene når du har angitt verdien i kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the color used to initially display a link.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> som representerer fargene som brukes til å vise først en kobling.

trans-unit.source: The default value is the user's Internet Explorer setting for the link color.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er brukeren for Internet Explorer innstillingen for koblingsfarge for.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the link was visited.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om koblingen ble åpnet.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.TrackVisitedState%2A> property is set to `true`, the LinkVisited property is automatically set when the link is visited.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.TrackVisitedState%2A>er satt til `true`, LinkVisited-egenskapen angis automatisk når koblingen besøk.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.TrackVisitedState%2A>

trans-unit.source: A link is visited if it has been activated by selecting it with the mouse or keyboard.
trans-unit.target: En kobling er besøkte hvis den er aktivert ved å velge den med musen eller tastaturet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the link has been visited; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis koblingen er fulgt; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the row containing the cell will be unshared when the mouse button is pressed while the pointer is over the cell.
trans-unit.target: Angir om raden som inneholder cellen blir delt i museknappen trykkes under pekeren over cellen.

trans-unit.source: MouseDownUnsharesRow is called just before <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.OnMouseDown%2A>.
trans-unit.target: MouseDownUnsharesRow kalles like før <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.OnMouseDown%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.OnMouseDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.OnMouseDown%2A> has the effect of unsharing the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: Det må returnere `true` hvis kallet til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.OnMouseDown%2A>har effekten avslutting av deling av raden som inneholder cellen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.OnMouseDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: It should return `false` otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Det må returnere `false` ellers.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om deling av rad [anbefalte fremgangsmåter for skalering i Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about the mouse click.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder data om klikket.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the mouse pointer is over the link; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis pekeren er over koblingen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the row containing the cell will be unshared when the mouse pointer leaves the cell.
trans-unit.target: Angir om raden som inneholder cellen være delt når musepekeren går ut av cellen.

trans-unit.source: MouseLeaveUnsharesRow is called just before <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.OnMouseLeave%2A>.
trans-unit.target: MouseLeaveUnsharesRow kalles like før <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.OnMouseLeave%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.OnMouseLeave%2A>

trans-unit.source: MouseLeaveUnsharesRow must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.OnMouseLeave%2A> has the effect of unsharing the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: MouseLeaveUnsharesRow må returnere `true` hvis kallet til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.OnMouseLeave%2A>har effekten avslutting av deling av raden som inneholder cellen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.OnMouseLeave%2A>

trans-unit.source: It should return `false` otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Det må returnere `false` ellers.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om deling av rad [anbefalte fremgangsmåter for skalering i Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen i raden som inneholder cellen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the link displayed by the cell is not in the normal state; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis koblingen som vises av cellen ikke er i tilstanden normal; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the row containing the cell will be unshared when the mouse pointer moves over the cell.
trans-unit.target: Angir om raden som inneholder cellen blir delt i flytter pekeren over cellen.

trans-unit.source: The MouseMoveUnsharesRow method is called just before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.OnMouseMove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden MouseMoveUnsharesRow kalles like før den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.OnMouseMove%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.OnMouseMove%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.OnMouseMove%2A> has the effect of unsharing the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: Det må returnere `true` hvis kallet til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.OnMouseMove%2A>har effekten avslutting av deling av raden som inneholder cellen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.OnMouseMove%2A>

trans-unit.source: It should return `false` otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Det må returnere `false` ellers.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om deling av rad [anbefalte fremgangsmåter for skalering i Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about the mouse click.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder data om klikket.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the mouse pointer is over the link and the link is has not yet changed color to reflect the hover state; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis pekeren er over koblingen og koblingen ikke ble endret fargen for å gjenspeile Hold pekeren-tilstanden. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the row containing the cell will be unshared when the mouse button is released while the pointer is over the cell.
trans-unit.target: Angir om raden som inneholder cellen blir delt i den museknappen under pekeren over cellen.

trans-unit.source: MouseUpUnsharesRow is called just before <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.OnMouseUp%2A>.
trans-unit.target: MouseUpUnsharesRow kalles like før <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.OnMouseUp%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.OnMouseUp%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.OnMouseUp%2A> has the effect of unsharing the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: Det må returnere `true` hvis kallet til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.OnMouseUp%2A>har effekten avslutting av deling av raden som inneholder cellen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.OnMouseUp%2A>

trans-unit.source: It should return `false` otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Det må returnere `false` ellers.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om deling av rad [anbefalte fremgangsmåter for skalering i Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about the mouse click.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder data om klikket.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the mouse pointer is over the link; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis pekeren er over koblingen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called when a character key is released while the focus is on a cell.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når en nøkkel for tegn er utgitt mens fokus er på en celle.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for den cellen overordnet rad.

trans-unit.source: Called when the user holds down a mouse button while the pointer is on a cell.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når brukeren holder nede musen mens pekeren er på en celle.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: Called when the mouse pointer leaves the cell.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når musepekeren går ut av cellen.

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for den cellen overordnet rad.

trans-unit.source: Called when the mouse pointer moves within a cell.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når musepekeren flytter i en celle.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: Called when the user releases a mouse button while the pointer is on a cell.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når brukeren slipper en museknappen mens pekeren er på en celle.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: Paints the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Maler gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> brukes til å fargemerknader i <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that needs to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som representerer området i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> som må tegnet på nytt.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that contains the bounds of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som inneholder grensene for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> som blir malt.

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Radindeksen i cellen som males.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values that specifies the state of the cell.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"> </xref> verdier som angir tilstanden til cellen.

trans-unit.source: The data of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Dataene i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> som blir malt.

trans-unit.source: The formatted data of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: De formaterte dataene i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> som blir malt.

trans-unit.source: An error message that is associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: En feilmelding som er knyttet til cellen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that contains formatting and style information about the cell.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> som inneholder informasjon om cellen formatering og stil.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that contains border styles for the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> som inneholder Kantlinjestilene for celle som males.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"></xref> values that specifies which parts of the cell need to be painted.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av det <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"> </xref> verdier som angir hvilke deler av cellen må males.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that describes the current object.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en streng som beskriver gjeldende objektet.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current object.
trans-unit.target: En streng som representerer gjeldende objekt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the link changes color when it is visited.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om koblingen endrer farge når den er åpnet.

trans-unit.source: When `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.LinkVisited%2A> property will not be automatically set to `true` when visited.
trans-unit.target: Når `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.LinkVisited%2A>egenskapen ikke automatisk settes til `true` når besøk.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.LinkVisited%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.TrackVisitedState%2A> property of the owning column also sets the TrackVisitedState property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Angivelse av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.TrackVisitedState%2A>-egenskapen til kolonnen eier også angir egenskapen TrackVisitedState for hver celle i kolonnen og oppdaterer kolonnen skjermbildet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.TrackVisitedState%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil overstyre den angitte verdien for individuelle celler, kan du angi celleverdiene når du har angitt verdien i kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the link changes color when it is selected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis koblingen endrer farge når den er merket. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.Text*> property value is displayed as the link text.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om kolonnen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.Text*>egenskapsverdien vises som koblingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.Text*>

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A> property of the owning column also sets the UseColumnTextForLinkValue property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Angivelse av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A>-egenskapen til kolonnen eier også angir egenskapen UseColumnTextForLinkValue for hver celle i kolonnen og oppdaterer kolonnen skjermbildet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil overstyre den angitte verdien for individuelle celler, kan du angi celleverdiene når du har angitt verdien i kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.Text*> property value is displayed as the link text; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue*> property value is displayed as the link text.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kolonnen <> </> *> egenskapsverdien vises som koblingstekst. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> Hvis cellen <> </> *> egenskapsverdien vises som koblingen.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data type of the values in the cell.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir datatypen for verdiene i cellen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> representing the data type of the value in the cell.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>som representerer datatypen verdien i cellen.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color used to display a link that has been previously visited.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir fargen som brukes til å vise en kobling som er fulgt tidligere.

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.VisitedLinkColor%2A> property of the owning column also sets the VisitedLinkColor property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Angivelse av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.VisitedLinkColor%2A>-egenskapen til kolonnen eier også angir egenskapen VisitedLinkColor for hver celle i kolonnen og oppdaterer kolonnen skjermbildet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.VisitedLinkColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil overstyre den angitte verdien for individuelle celler, kan du angi celleverdiene når du har angitt verdien i kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the color used to display a link that has been visited.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> som representerer fargene som brukes til å vise en kobling som har blitt åpnet.

trans-unit.source: The default value is the user's Internet Explorer setting for the visited link color.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er brukeren for Internet Explorer innstillingen for fargen besøkte koblingen.
